OUTFITS: Cracked ceremonial porcelain mask veining like dried blood
Holy veil soaked in blood and incense smoke
Monastic hood with burnt embroidery and singed edges
Bone corset with gold inlays and hair-thin fractures
Obsidian ritual armor fused to exposed collarbones
LIGHTING: Extreme chiaroscuro on the face, carving the wounds into icon-like shapes
Harsh sidelight revealing cracks and scarred scripture
Infernal underglow pulsing from inside the chest cavity
Cold top-down cathedral beam cutting through incense fog
BACKGROUNDS: featureless black void with a few floating gilded fragments of broken halos; large-scale, non-repeating surface.
a smooth plaster wall with scattered paper talismans and hand-brushed cursed kanji sheets pinned irregularly; no wallpaper, no repeating motifs.
dark chapel wall with faded fresco ghosts and dripping candle wax trails, no repeating patterns.
velvet black abyss with distant halo echoes and soft, fog-like noise, avoiding tiled textures.
OBJECTS: Burnt scriptures clinging to the skin
Kanji symbols painted across the face
Cursed ideograms carved into the skin
Sutra characters written with ink and ash
Korean ideograms inscribed like sacred wounds
Arcane letters emerging from torn skin
Forbidden alphabet scrawled across the face
Black thread stitching skin in sacred geometric patterns
Wax seals pressed over sealed wounds
Gold leaf fragments embedded along scarred calligraphy
POSES: Looking down in suffering, face almost filling the frame
Closed eyes with ashes falling in front of the lens
Direct gaze through symbolic tears, static like an icon
EXPRESSIONS: Silent agony held in absolute stillness
Religious ecstasy on the edge of collapse
Tranquil sorrow with faint, unreadable smile
Void gaze as if already beyond human pain
CAMERA_ANGLES: Hyper close-up from below, emphasizing carved symbols
Extreme close-up on face, cropping just above the chest
ATMOSPHERES: Iconic dread suspended in frozen time
Sacred rot emanating from every crack
Ritualized silence heavy like cathedral air
Apocalyptic vision contained in a single face
ACCESSORIES: Broken reliquary shards hovering around the head

HORROR_INTENSITY.0: Sacral, iconic and mysterious, with subtle wounds and restrained symbolism.
HORROR_INTENSITY.1: Visceral but composed, sacred elements clearly fused with flesh and scripture.
HORROR_INTENSITY.2: Extremely disturbing sacred horror, intense flesh-symbol fusion and invasive ritual marks.
